definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: So the good spirit collected wood every night.
sentences.chinese: 於是這位善良的神仙每天晚上收集木柴。

sentences.english: I am interested in meeting good people. I prefer quality over quantity.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡善良的人，我覺得質比量重要。

sentences.english: There is this good ol' barber in some city in US.
sentences.chinese: 在美國某城，有個善良的老理髮師。

sentences.english: She was a very kind and amiable old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他是個善良和氣的老太太。

sentences.english: Metaphysically speaking, good results in oneness, and evil results in a sense of separation.
sentences.chinese: 純粹說來，善良產生合一，邪惡產生分離。

sentences.english: Call it my weakness. Call it kindness, " one brigadier told The Guardian.
sentences.chinese: 那是我的弱點，我的善良，”一個准將告訴《衛報》。

sentences.english: THESEUS A very gentle beast, and of a good conscience.
sentences.chinese: 一頭非常善良的畜生，有一顆好良心。

sentences.english: Like your romantic, kind-hearted, simple, tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡你的浪漫，善良，單純，高大，有力。
人的本性是善良的，有分寸的。

sentences.english: Goodness often charms more than mere beauty.
sentences.chinese: 善良常比美麗更有魔力。

sentences.english: By the end of the story, the Grinch becomes a kind person.
sentences.chinese: 到了故事的結尾，聖誕怪傑變成一個善良的人。

sentences.english: I would looking to find a person of high moral character, kindhearted, loving family good man.
sentences.chinese: 我要尋找一位品格高尚，善良，熱愛家庭的好男人。

sentences.english: Humility, justice and kindness are virtues.
sentences.chinese: 謙讓，公正和善良是美德。

sentences.english: “Anna is just a very easy person to get to know, that’s why she had a lot of friends, ” Mr. Guirguis said.
sentences.chinese: 安娜非常平易近人，純真善良，所以她有許多朋友。

sentences.english: Taking a blind man across the street is a kind act.
sentences.chinese: 過馬路是一種善良的行爲。

definition: to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
